sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { fetchProject, createTask, updateTask, deleteTask } from '../store/tasksSlice'; import api from '../api/api'; import { io } from 'socket.io-client'; const WS = process.env.REACT_APP_WS_URL || 'http://localhost:4000'; export default function ProjectDetail(){ const { id } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const project = useSelector(s=>s.tasks.project); const tasks = useSelector(s=>s.tasks.tasks); const loading = useSelector(s=>s.tasks.loading); const [title,setTitle]=useState(''); const [desc,setDesc]=useState(''); const [statusFilter,setStatusFilter]=useState('all'); const [users,setUsers]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(fetchProject(id)); const socket = io(WS); socket.emit('joinProject', id); socket.on('task:created', ()=> dispatch(fetchProject(id))); socket.on('task:updated', ()=> dispatch(fetchProject(id))); socket.on('task:deleted', ()=> dispatch(fetchProject(id))); return ()=>{ socket.emit('leaveProject', id); socket.disconnect(); }; },[dispatch,id]); useEffect(()=>{ api.get('/users').then(r=>setUsers(r.data)).catch(()=>{}); },[]); const handleCreate=async ()=>{ if(!title) return alert('Title required'); await dispatch(createTask({ title, description: desc, projectId: id })); setTitle(''); setDesc(''); }; const handleUpdateStatus=async (task,newStatus)=> await dispatch(updateTask({ id: task.id, data: { status: newStatus } })); const handleDelete=async (task)=>{ if(!window.confirm('Delete?')) return; await dispatch(deleteTask(task.id)); }; const filtered = tasks.filter(t=> statusFilter==='all' ? true : t.status===statusFilter); return (

Project: {project?.title}

{project?.description}

setTitle(e.target.value)}/>setDesc(e.target.value)} style={{marginLeft:8}}/>
{loading &&
Loading...
}
    {filtered.map(t=> (
  • {t.title} - {t.description}
    Status: {t.status} | Due: {t.dueDate ? new Date(t.dueDate).toLocaleDateString() : '—'}
    Assignee: {t.assignee ? t.assignee.name : 'Unassigned'}
    • ))}
); }
